programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A sailing trip turns into a nightmare when a woman uncovers the dark past of her mother's new boyfriend. programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Liam Neeson. An ageing career criminal and former boxer discovers he has developed a neurodegenerative disease that gives him only months to live. programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: Drama starring rap artist Eminem and Kim Basinger. Jimmy "Rabbit" Smith is stuck in a dead-end factory job in a tough area of Detroit where he lives with his highly strung mother and little sister. programme.desc: Biographical music drama starring Kingsley Ben-Adir. programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. Unconventional speech therapist Lionel Logue is enlisted to help the future George VI find his voice - and despite Logue's disregard for all things stately, the two men form an unlikely bond Tom Hooper - Director Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Alice Walker's novel, starring Fantasia Barrino and Taraji P Henson. In early 20th-century Georgia, young Celie is forced to marry the tyrannical farmer "Mister". programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: Action thriller directed by and starring Dev Patel. programme.title: Ready Player One

When a mysterious arsonist starts burning down Broadway, New York's firemen begin vanishing. When the young son of Rick O'Connell and his Egyptologist wife find an ancient bracelet that holds power over the armies of the fearsome Scorpion King, it attracts the attention of Meela, reincarnated lover of the resurrected high priest Imhotep, who needs the artefact to help him defeat the Scorpion King and become the ultimate ruler Stephen Sommers - Director Brendan Fraser - Rick O'Connell Rachel Weisz - Evelyn / Nefertiri John Hannah - Jonathan Arnold Vosloo - Imhotep Oded Fehr - Ardeth Bay Patricia Velasquez - Meela / Anck-Su-Namun Dwayne Johnson - The Scorpion King Freddie Boath - Alex Alun Armstrong - Mr Hafez Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje - Lock-Nah Shaun Parkes - Izzy Buttons Aharon Ipale - Pharaoh Donna Air - Showgirl.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Vin Diesel, Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham and Charlize Theron. The whole team have dispersed to live quieter lives. programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Daisy Edgar-Jones and Glen Powell. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview: May 2025
programme.desc: A look ahead to the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Action spy thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Emmanuelle Béart. The elite Impossible Mission Force's latest assignment is to recover stolen information that threatens to blow the cover of US spies throughout the world. But the plan goes disastrously wrong Brian De Palma - Director Tom Cruise - Ethan Hunt Jon Voight - Jim Phelps Emmanuelle Béart - Claire Henry Czerny - Kittridge Jean Reno - Krieger Ving Rhames - Luther Kristin Scott Thomas - Sarah Davies Vanessa Redgrave - Max Dale Dye - Frank Barnes Marcel Iures - Golitsyn Emilio Estevez - Jack Ingeborga Dapkunaite - Hannah Rolf Saxon - CIA analyst William Donloe Andreas Wisniewski - Max's companion.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is on the trail of his rogue former colleague Sean Ambrose, following the theft of a synthetic virus capable of wiping out the world's population. In an effort to get closer to Ambrose, Ethan is accompanied on the mission by the renegade agent's former lover John Woo - Director Tom Cruise - Ethan Hunt Dougray Scott - Sean Ambrose Thandiwe Newton - Nyah Hall Ving Rhames - Luther Stickel Richard Roxburgh - Hugh Stamp John Polson - Billy Baird Rade Serbedzija - Dr Nekhorvich Anthony Hopkins - Mission Commander Swanbeck.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise, Philip Seymour Hoffman and Michelle Monaghan. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is retired from active duty and trying to live a quiet life with his new fiancée, Julia. When an operative he personally trained is kidnapped while investigating ruthless arms dealer Owen Davian, Hunt agrees to help rescue her, but the mission goes disastrously wrong J J Abrams - Director Tom Cruise - Ethan Hunt Philip Seymour Hoffman - Owen Davian Michelle Monaghan - Julia Ving Rhames - Luther Billy Crudup - Musgrave Jonathan Rhys Meyers - Declan Keri Russell - Lindsey Laurence Fishburne - Theodore Brassel Maggie Q - Zhen Eddie Marsan - Brownway Simon Pegg - Benji Dunn.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Westerns
programme.desc: Saddle up, Cowboy, for a gunslinging edition of the Cinema List. Explore a fistful of modern and classic Western movies to enjoy, from Django Unchained to The Good, The Bad and The Ugly.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: A youngster called Chan Lok-kwan accidentally enters the Walled City, discovers the order amidst its chaos, and learns important life lessons along the way. Chinese crime thriller with subtitles, starring Raymond Lam, Louis Koo and Sammo Hung Cheang Soi - Director Louis Koo - Cyclone Raymond Lam - Chan Lok-kwan Terrance Lau - Shin Philip Ng - King Tony Wu Tsz Tung - Twelfth Master German Cheung - AV Richie Jen - Chau Sammo Hung - Mr Big.

programme.title: Jackie Chan's Project A
programme.desc: Martial arts adventure starring Jackie Chan. A detachment from the navy sets out to catch a notorious pirate operating on the Chinese coast at the turn of the 20th century Jackie Chan - Director Jackie Chan - Dragon Ma Sammo Hung - Fei Yuen Biao - Hung Tin Tze Lau Hak Suen - Admiral.

programme.title: Dragon Lord
programme.desc: Two former childhood friends spend most of their free time chasing after local girls. When a gang of smugglers starts sending precious Chinese artifacts to Westerners the mischievous duo take them on. Martial arts comedy, starring Jackie Chan, Mars and Michael Wai-Man Chan Jackie Chan - Director.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution. After killing the street thug who was directly responsible for her death, he finds himself in the middle of a war with the dead man's brother, who is equally hell-bent on getting even. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis and Thomas Jane Jared Cohn - Director Clive Standen - William Duncan Theo Rossi - Rory Fetter Bruce Willis - Donnie Fetter Thomas Jane - Dante Jackie Moore - Luna Mike Tyson - Roach.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: Remake of the 1972 Charles Bronson action thriller, starring Jason Statham and Ben Foster. He is desperate to earn money to keep a roof over the head of his younger sister Abby, but is soon locked in a fight for survival. programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Supernatural horror comedy sequel starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega. In the decades since narrowly avoiding marriage to the lascivious demon Betelgeuse, Lydia Deetz has found fame as a TV occultist. programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, Romance, Drama ║ 1985 ║ PG
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Meryl Streep and Robert Redford. Karen Blixen leaves her native Denmark in 1913 to marry a Swedish baron and run a coffee farm in Kenya. programme.title: Field of Dreams

Ray Kinsella, an unfulfilled Iowa farmer, hears a mysterious voice that inspires him to build a baseball field on his land, to the consternation of his family and neighbours. programme.title: 48 Hrs
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Nick Nolte and Eddie Murphy. With vicious escaped convict Albert Ganz loose in San Francisco, bullish cop Jack Cates needs all the help he can get to track him down. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - May 2025 1
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
programme.desc: Monumental John Ford western with Jimmy Stewart as the straight arrow lawyer who enlists hard-hitting cowboy John Wayne to tame vicious gunslinger Lee Marvin. (1962)(118 mins).

programme.title: The Money Pit
programme.desc: New York couple Tom Hanks and Shelley Long find what seems like the perfect house, but before long they've been sucked into a renovation nightmare. Fun comedy. (1986)(88 mins).

programme.title: Raiders Of The Lost Ark
programme.desc: Harrison Ford whips it to the Nazis in a race to locate the Ark of the Covenant. Indiana Jones makes his debut in Spielberg's rollicking ride. (1981)(110 mins).

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Temple Of..
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and Short Round join forces in India, intent on reclaiming a stolen rock. Discriminatory content/violence. (1984)(118 mins).

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Last Crusade
programme.desc: The Nazis close in on the Holy Grail, but Indy's got a secret weapon. Sean Connery and Harrison Ford star. Contains moderate violence. (1989)(121 mins).

programme.desc: Grizzled cop Nick Nolte and wiseass crook Eddie Murphy clash when they're thrown together to catch a killer. Action comedy hit. Contains strong language/sex/violence. (1982)(92 mins).

programme.title: Naked Gun: From The Files..
programme.desc: Leslie Nielsen stars as incompetent cop Frank Drebin, who is out to stop a plot to assassinate the Queen. Top slapstick comedy. Flashing images. (1988)(81 mins).

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2:..
programme.desc: Slapstick fun as detective Leslie Nielsen stumbles upon an evil plan to destroy America. Contains strong language and flashing images. (1991)(81 mins).

programme.desc: Cop Leslie Nielsen is hauled out of retirement to save the Academy Awards from bombers. Anna Nicole Smith co-stars in this sequel. Discriminatory content/flashing images. (1994)(79 mins).

programme.desc: Car repossessor Emilio Estevez finds himself on a bizarrely surreal quest to track down a valuable '64 Chevy. Cult action comedy. Strong language/flashing images. (1984)(88 mins).

programme.desc: Bruce Lee is the martial artist competing with international bruisers and cracking an opium racket in his spare time. Classic action. Violent scenes. (1973)(99 mins).

programme.title: Snakes On A Plane
programme.desc: FBI agent Samuel L Jackson is escorting a murder witness, but has to play hero when his plane is overrun with hordes of venomous snakes. Brilliantly bonkers thriller. (2006)(102 mins).

programme.title: Wonder Woman (2017)
programme.desc: Gal Gadot stars as an Amazon warrior princess who leaves her hidden island home to fight in the Great War. (2017)(136 mins).

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: A top-secret mission to the mysterious Skull Island descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Tom Hiddleston stars. (2017)(114 mins).

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Alcoholic superhero Will Smith hires a PR officer to help improve his image. With Charlize Theron. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2008)(98 mins).

programme.title: 1st Test'24: PAK v ENG - D5 Hlts

programme.desc: The story of the greatest year in the history of Aberdeen, when the yet to be knighted, Alex Ferguson, guided the club to two European trophies in the space of six months.

programme.title: EFL 08/09: Cardiff v Swansea
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Cardiff City meet Swansea City in a thrilling south Wales derby at Ninian Park in 2009.

programme.title: EFL 08/09: Millwall v Scunthorpe
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Millwall face Scunthorpe at Wembley Stadium in the League 1 play-off final in 2009.

programme.title: EFL 09/10: Sheff Utd v Sheff Weds
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Sheffield United and Sheffield Wednesday meet in a thrilling Steel City derby in September 2009.

programme.title: EFL 10/11: Peterborough v So'ton
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Peterborough and Southampton meet in an eight-goal thriller in League 1 in February 2011.

programme.title: Championship Season Review 16/17
programme.desc: A look back at the 2016-2017 season in the Sky Bet Championship, remembering all of the biggest stories as they happened across another eventful season.

programme.title: Best Goals: EFL Cup: 2021/22
programme.desc: The 2021/22 EFL Cup threw up some truly stunning goals. Take a look back at the competition's best strikes in this recap of another year of scintillating Carabao Cup action.

programme.title: EFL Trophy Final 2021/22
programme.desc: Rotherham and Sutton meet at Wembley to contest the 2022 Papa John's Trophy. Having both reached this stage via spot kicks in their respective semi-finals, who will emerge the winner?

programme.title: EFL C'Ship Playoff Final
programme.desc: Chris Wilder's Sheffield United and Roger Le Bris' Sunderland face off for a place in next year's Premier League, as Wembley Stadium hosts the 2024-25 Sky Bet Championship play-off final.

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Final: League 2 24/25
programme.desc: Wembley Stadium sets the stage for AFC Wimbledon and Walsall in the 2024-25 Sky Bet League Two play-off final, with the winner ascending to England's third tier. (26.05).

programme.title: EFL SF: Chesterfield v Walsall
programme.desc: Chesterfield and Walsall face off in the first leg of a Sky Bet League Two play-off semi-final. Can the hosts take a big step towards back-to-back promotions with a win at home? (11.05).

programme.title: EFL SF: Notts County v Wimbledon
programme.desc: Despite losing out on an automatic-promotion spot, Notts County continue their promotion bid with a Sky Bet League Two play-off semi-final first leg against AFC Wimbledon. (11.05).

programme.title: EFL SF: Walsall v Chesterfield
programme.desc: The second leg of the Sky Bet League Two play-off semi-final between Walsall and Chesterfield. The hosts bring a two-goal advantage back to the Bescot Stadium. (16.05).

programme.title: EFL SF: Wimbledon v Notts County
programme.desc: A Sky Bet League Two play-off semi-final second leg between AFC Wimbledon and Notts County. The hosts bring a 1-0 lead to the Cherry Red Records Stadium after the first leg. (17.05).

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Final: League 2 24/25
programme.desc: Wembley Stadium sets the stage for AFC Wimbledon and Walsall in the 2024-25 Sky Bet League Two play-off final, with the winner ascending to England's third tier. (26.05).

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Final: League 1 24/25
programme.desc: Wembley Stadium hosts the Sky Bet League One play-off final, as Charlton Athletic and Leyton Orient go toe to toe for promotion. Charlton emerged victorious in both league games. (25.05).

programme.title: EFL SF: Leyton Orient v Stockport
programme.desc: Having secured their highest league finish for 23 years, Stockport County visit Brisbane Road for the first leg of their Sky Bet League One play-off semi-final with Leyton Orient. (10.05).

programme.title: EFL SF: Wycombe v Charlton
programme.desc: The first leg of a Sky Bet League One play-off semi-final. (10.05).

programme.title: EFL SF: Stockport v Leyton Orient
programme.desc: The second leg of a Sky Bet League One play-off semi-final between Stockport County and Leyton Orient. Things remain all-square after the first leg after a 2-2 thriller. (14.05).

programme.title: EFL SF: Charlton v Wycombe
programme.desc: The second leg of the Sky Bet League One play-off semi-final between Charlton Athletic and Wycombe Wanderers. With the first leg ending goalless, it is all to play for. (15.05).

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Final: League 1 24/25
programme.desc: Wembley Stadium hosts the Sky Bet League One play-off final, as Charlton Athletic and Leyton Orient go toe to toe for promotion. Charlton emerged victorious in both league games. (25.05).

programme.title: EFL Cup 24/25: L'pool v Newcastle
programme.desc: In an EFL Cup final of firsts, Arne Slot targets his first piece of silverware with Liverpool while Newcastle bid to end the club's 70-year wait for a first major trophy since 1955. (16.03).

programme.desc: Emanuel Navarrete faces Liam Wilson for the vacant WBO world junior lightweight championship. Navarrete is looking to become a three-weight world champion with a win. (03.02).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Alimkhanuly v Gualtieri
programme.desc: For the unified middleweight championship of the world, Janibek Alimkhanuly of Kazakhstan fights Germany's Vincenzo Gualtieri in Rosenberg, Texas. (14.10).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Anderson v Rudenko
programme.desc: Ten rounds of heavyweight boxing await, as an undefeated Jared Anderson makes his way to the ring to face Andriy Rudenko in Tulsa, Oklahoma. (27.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Barboza v Zorrilla
programme.desc: The main event spotlight shines upon Arnold Barboza Jr and Danielito Zorrilla as the two unbeaten super-lightweights enter the squared circle for ten rounds of boxing. (16.07).

programme.title: LIVE: NRL: Men's State Of Origin #1
programme.desc: The 2025 Ampol State of Origin Series kicks off at the home of the Maroons as Suncorp Stadium hosts game one between Queensland and New South Wales.

programme.title: LIVE: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: Get up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news, headline-making interviews and local NFL stories.

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Navarrete v Baez
programme.desc: Emanuel Navarrete looks to extend his winning streak of 30 consecutive bouts as he defends his WBO featherweight crown against fellow Mexican Eduardo Baez in San Diego. (21.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Navarrete v Valdez
programme.desc: Glendale's Desert Diamond Arena sets the scene for an all-Mexican title bout, as Emanuel Navarrete defends his WBO junior lightweight championship against Oscar Valdez. (12.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Inoue v Dasmarinas
programme.desc: Japan's electric power puncher and pound for pound star Naoya Inoue defends his bantamweight world titles against Michael Dasmarinas in Las Vegas.

programme.title: NBC's Pro-Football Talk
programme.desc: Mike Florio and Chris Simms present this NFL talk show, as they discuss and debate the biggest stories from around the league.

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Pedraza v Commey
programme.desc: A super lightweight fight between two of the division's main contenders as technician Jose Pedraza faces power puncher Richard Commey in Tulsa. (28.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Ramirez v Pedraza
programme.desc: After losing his undisputed super lightweight showdown to Josh Taylor, José Ramírez looks to bounce back with a statement win over former two-weight world champ José Pedraza.

programme.title: Men's State Of Origin #1
programme.desc: The 2025 Ampol State of Origin Series kicks off at the home of the Maroons as Suncorp Stadium hosts game one between Queensland and New South Wales. (28.05).

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the Regions Tradition, a PGA Tour Champions event held at Greystone Golf and Country Club in Birmingham, Alabama.

programme.title: EFL 12/13: Brentford v Swindon
programme.desc: Remember some classic matches from English football. Here, Brentford face Swindon Town in May 2013 in the League 1 semi final at Griffin Park.

programme.title: EFL 12/13: Bradford v Arsenal
programme.desc: A look at some of the greatest matches from English football. Here, League 2 side Bradford City take on Premier League giants Arsenal in the Football League Cup in December 2012.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Derby v Hull City
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Derby County and Hull City go head-to-head in a thrilling encounter back in 2017.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Sheff Weds v Sheff Utd
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, relive a thrilling Steel City derby between rivals Sheffield Wednesday and Sheffield United at Hillsborough Stadium.

programme.title: PL Greatest: N'castle/S'land 2013
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Sunderland, the 3-0 win at rivals Newcastle in 2013, their first there in 13 years.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Watford/Liverpool 2015
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Watford, the 3-0 win over Liverpool at Vicarage Road in December 2015.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:WHU/Man Utd '16
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for West Ham, their 3-2 win over Man Utd in their final game at Upton Park.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Wigan/Arsenal'10
